facebook/rocksdb.summary: Recent activities include the introduction of a new interface method SecondaryIndex::NewIterator to enable querying the index, and support for KNN search for FAISS IVF indices, both of which expand the functionality of the database and enhance its performance.

facebook/react-native.summary: A recent update has added a JS Engine identifier, specifically 'hermes', to the JS runtime Error prototype, which will enhance error reporting and debugging capabilities within the framework.

facebook/openbmc.summary: Recent activities include addressing a fw-util test failure and fixing test_restendpoint failures for the javaisland component, which contributes to the overall stability and reliability of the open-source BMC firmware stack.
